name: Terry Green
description1: Terry has been tattooing and learning for over 13 years and is one of the best tattoo artists around our city. Each of his works is incredible.
description2: You will be able to find an individual approach to your tattoo. If you don't know the design you want, Terry will help you and make a tattoo according to your wishes. Once you see Terry's original drawings, you will fall in love with them and want to have the same tattoo.

name: Nick Buffay
description1: Nick has been tattooing and learning for over 10 years and is one of the best tattoo artists around our city. Each of his works is incredible.
description2: You will be able to find an individual approach to your tattoo. If you don't know the design you want, Nick will help you and make a tattoo according to your wishes. Once you see Nick's original drawings, you will fall in love with them and want to have the same tattoo.

name: Sandra Geller
description1: Sandra has been tattooing and learning for over 7 years and is one of the best tattoo artists around our city. Each of his works is incredible.
